name: Tutorial Quests
description: A short set of quests to get you going.

quests.description: Defeat the Pokémon. Click to deal damage!
Capture 1 Pokémon. When you defeat a Pokémon, a Poké Ball is thrown and you have a chance to capture it.
Defeat 10 Pokémon on Route 2. Click Route 2 on the map to move there and begin fighting.
Go back to Pallet Town and say bye to mom.
Talk to the Old Man in Viridian City to learn about catching.
Use what you've learned to catch 5 Pidgey. Talk to the Old Man again if you need a reminder.
Buy the Dungeon Ticket from Viridian City Shop.
Gather 50 Dungeon Tokens by (re)capturing Pokémon, then clear the Viridian Forest dungeon.
Defeat Pewter City Gym. Click the town on the map to move there, then click the Gym button to start the battle.

name: Bill's Grandpa Treasure Hunt
description: Check the hints and bring Bill's Grandpa the Pokémon he wants to see.

quests.description: Talk to Bill's Grandpa in Bill's House.
Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that is pink and like a balloon.
Catch the desired Pokémon.
Defeat 100 Normal-type Pokémon.
Show your Jigglypuff to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that is round, blue, and has leaves growing on its head.
Catch the desired Pokémon.
Defeat 100 Grass-type Pokémon.
Show your Oddish to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that has a red sphere in its body and is shaped like a star.
Catch the desired Pokémon.
Defeat 100 Water-type Pokémon.
Show your Staryu to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that is very loyal and supposedly roars pretty well.
Catch the desired Pokémon.
Defeat 100 Fire-type Pokémon.
Show your Growlithe to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa wants you to catch a Pokémon that has a yellow body and red cheeks.
Catch the desired Pokémon.
Defeat 100 Electric-type Pokémon.
Show your Pikachu to Bill's Grandpa.
Bill's Grandpa would like to have a battle with you!
Talk to Bill's Grandpa one last time.

name: Team Rocket
description: Some nasty villains are up to no good.

quests.description: Illegal activity is afoot. Clear the Rocket Game Corner in Celadon City.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: I see that you raise Pokémon with utmost care. A child like you would never understand what I hope to achieve. I shall step aside this time! I hope we meet again...

quests.description: Team Rocket has occupied Silph Co. Clear Silph Co. in Saffron City to find the Card Key.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: What kept you $playername$? Hahaha! I thought you'd turn up if I waited here! I guess Team Rocket slowed you down! Not that I care! I saw you in Saffron, so I decided to see if you got better!

quests.description: Blue is getting in your way. Defeat him in Silph Co.
Team Rocket has occupied Silph Co. Clear Silph Co. in Saffron City once more to foil their plans.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Arrgh!! I lost again!? Blast it all! You ruined our plans for Silph! But Team Rocket will never fall! $playername$, never forget that all Pokémon exist for Team Rocket! I must go, but I shall return!

quests.description: If you take down Team Rocket's leader one more time they will surely never come back from this! Clear Viridian City Gym.

name: Mining Expedition
description: Explore the underground!

quests.description: Buy the Explorer Kit from Cinnabar Island Shop.
Collect all buried treasure 5 times in the Underground mines.

name: Bill's Errand
description: Bill has asked you to journey to the Sevii Islands with him to set up a digital connection to mainland Kanto.

quests.description: Use the Subregional Travel button at the top of the map to travel to the Sevii Islands and speak with Celio on One Island.
Ask the Game Corner owner on Two Island about the meteorite.
A biker gang has invaded Three island. They will not let you continue to Berry Forest. Defeat the Biker Goons.
Defeat the biker gang's leader.
Find Lostelle. Clear Berry Forest.
Lostelle has been found. Return to the Game Corner owner on Two Island.
Deliver the meteorite to Celio on One Island.

name: Persons of Interest
description: Some people want to talk to you.

quests.description: Talk to the Breeder in Saffron City.
Talk to the Gem Scientist in Pewter City.

name: The Sick Ampharos
description: Jasmine's Ampharos seems to be sick!

quests.description: Clear the Olivine Lighthouse dungeon in Olivine City.
Talk to Jasmine in the Olivine Lighthouse.
Talk to the Pharmacist in Cianwood City.
The Pharmacist said he needs some time to finish Amphys medicine. Clear the Cianwood City Gym in the meantime.
Talk to the Pharmacist in Cianwood City.
Give Amphy their medicine in the Olivine Lighthouse.
Talk to Jasmine in the Olivine Lighthouse.

name: Team Rocket Again
description: Team Rocket is up to no good again!

quests.description: Defeat the rampaging Red Gyarados!
Clear the Team Rocket's Hideout dungeon in Mahogany Town
Clear the Radio Tower dungeon in Goldenrod City

name: The Legendary Beasts
description: Investigate the legends surrounding the strange Burned Tower in Ecruteak City.

quests.description: Talk to Eusine in Ecruteak City.
Clear the Burned Tower.
Defeat Silver.
Talk to Pokéfan Derek in Ecruteak City.
Catch the Legendary Beasts.
Catch Raikou.
Catch Entei.
Catch Suicune.

name: Eusine's Chase
description: Eusine is looking for Suicune.

quests.description: Find Suicune.
Talk to Eusine in Cianwood City.
Defeat Eusine.
Find Suicune.
Talk to Eusine in Mahogany Town.
Find Suicune.
Talk to Eusine in Vermilion City.
Find Suicune.
Talk to Eusine in Fuchsia City.
Find Suicune.
Talk to Eusine in Bill's House.

name: Whirl Guardian
description: The Kimono Girls of Ecruteak City need help.

quests.description: Talk to Kimono Girl Zuki in Violet City.
Talk to Kimono Girl Naoko in the Ilex Forest.
Clear Ilex Forest to lead Naoko to safety.
Talk to Kimono Girl Miki at the Ecruteak City Dance Theatre.
Talk to Kimono Girl Sayo in the Ice Path.
Clear the Ice Path to give Sayo a push.
Talk to Kimono Girl Kuni in Goldenrod City.
Clear the Radio Tower to get rid of any lingering Team Rocket activity.
Meet the Kimono Girls at the Whirl Islands.
Catch Lugia in the Whirl Islands.

name: Rainbow Guardian
description: The Kimono Girls of Ecruteak City wish to speak with you again.

quests.description: Meet the Kimono Girls at the Ecruteak Dance Theatre.
Prove your abilities as a trainer to the Kimono Girls of Ecruteak City.
Catch Ho-Oh in the Tin Tower.

name: Unfinished Business
description: A request from Professor Oak.

quests.description: Talk to Professor Oak in Pallet Town.
Talk to Professor Ivy in her lab in the Sevii Islands.
Deliver the GS Ball to Professor Oak in Pallet Town.
Deliver the GS Ball to Kurt in Azalea Town in Johto.
Talk to Kurt again after becoming Champion of Johto.
Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.
Investigate the shrine in Ilex Forest.
Defeat the strange Pichu.
Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.
Investigate the Time Distortion in Tohjo Falls.
Defeat Giovanni.
Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.
Investigate the shrine in Ilex Forest.
Play with the Celebi in Ilex Forest.
Talk to Professor Oak in Azalea Town.

name: Land vs. Water
description: Put a stop to the schemes of Team Aqua and Team Magma!

quests.description: Stop Team Magma at Mt. Chimney Crater.
Stop Team Aqua at the Weather Institute.
Raid the Team Magma hideout.
Raid the Team Aqua hideout.
Team Aqua's leader Archie escaped from their hideout. Find him in the Seafloor Cavern and put a stop to this once and for all!

name: The Weather Trio
description: Put an ancient battle to rest.

quests.description: Investigate the commotion in Sootopolis City.
Explore the Cave of Origin to find Wallace.
Talk to Wallace in the Cave of Origin to learn how to stop Kyogre and Groudon from fighting.
Climb the Sky Pillar to find the super-ancient Pokémon Rayquaza.
Return to Sootopolis City to see what Rayquaza will do.
Talk to Wallace in the Cave of Origin about the aftermath of the battle.
Catch the Weather Trio.

name: Mystery of Deoxys
description: Discover the mystery of Deoxys.

quests.description: Defeat 500 Psychic-type Pokémon.
Capture or hatch 200 Psychic-type Pokémon.
Enter the Battle Frontier and defeat stage 100.

name: The Eon Duo
description: Track down the elusive Eon Duo.

quests.description: Watch a news report in Littleroot Town about a mysterious Pokémon.
Change channels to watch a different TV station in Littleroot town.
Go to Hoenn Pokémon League to claim your Eon ticket.
Claim your Eon Ticket in the Start Menu and investigate the Southern Island.
Catch the Eon Duo.
Catch Latias.
Catch Latios.

name: Celio's Errand
description: Celio has asked you to help him set up a digital connection between the Sevii Islands and Hoenn.

quests.description: Speak with Celio on One Island in Sevii.
Eavesdrop on the Team Rocket Grunts at Mt. Ember.
Two Team Rocket Grunts are blocking the entrance to Ruby Path. Defeat them.
Locate the Ruby. Clear Ruby Path in Mt. Ember.
Take the Ruby in Ruby Path
Return the Ruby to Celio on One Island
Help Lorelei with Team Rocket Grunts by clearing Icefall Cave on Four Island.
Talk to Lorelei in Icefall Cave
Talk to Gideon in Dotted Hole
Defeat the Three Team Rocket Grunts in Rocket Warehouse.
Defeat Team Rocket Executive Ariana in Rocket Warehouse.
Defeat Team Rocket Executive Archer in Rocket Warehouse.
Defeat Scientist Gideon to reclaim the Sapphire.
Return the Sapphire to Celio on One Island

name: Team Rocket's Pinkan Theme Park
description: Help Team Rocket build a theme park on Pinkan Island?

quests.description: Talk to Team Rocket on Pinkan Island to hear about their plans.
Mutate and harvest 1 Pinkan Berry at the farm.
Help Team Rocket recruit some Pinkan Pokémon
Collect Fairy Gems and Pixie Plates
Gain 10 Pixie Plates
Talk to Team Rocket on Pinkan Island to open the theme park!
Defeat Team Rocket Jessie & James on Pinkan Island.
Oh no! Officer Jenny has showed up. She's not happy! No time to plead your case, it's time to battle!

name: The Three Golems
description: Discover the secrets of the Sealed Chamber.

quests.description: Enter the Sealed Chamber to find clues.
Investigate the strange markings in the Sealed Chamber.
Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
Navigate the maze inside the Sealed Chamber.
Investigate the hidden message at the end of the Sealed Chamber maze.
Explore Hoenn by defeating Pokémon on the hinted routes to release the Regi Trio.
Catch the Regi Trio.

name: Wish Maker
description: Harness the power of the Millennium Comet and make a wish!

quests.description: Attend the opening ceremony of the Millennium Festival near Lavaridge Town.
Defeat Team Rocket Jessie & James at the Millennium Festival near Lavaridge Town.
Learn the legend of the Millennium Comet from Butler near Lavaridge Town.
Climb to the Mt. Chimney Crater to get a better view of the Millennium Comet as it passes.
You are being stalked by Absol, the Disaster Pokémon. Capture it or hatch your own to befriend it.
Examine the crystalline cocoon Butler gave you while at the Mt. Chimney Crater.
Butler has followed you to the Mt. Chimney Crater and is trying to kidnap Jirachi!
Butler has escaped through the Jagged Pass and hooked Jirachi up to some sort of machine. Fight him to free Jirachi.
Butler's attempts to resurrect Groudon have gone terribly wrong! Fight the resulting abomination!
Jirachi has escaped in the chaos and is roaming Hoenn. Catch Jirachi.

name: A Meta Discovery
description: Help Butler's wish come true, responsibly.

quests.description: Talk to Butler in the Jagged Pass to learn about his new plan.
Gather the materials Butler needs to rebuild his resurrection machine.
Catch or hatch 100 Electrode
Calibrate the machine by catching or hatching 5 Groudon
Deliver the materials to Butler in Mt. Chimney Crater and start the resurrection machine.
Butler has revived Meta Groudon at Mt. Chimney Crater. Catch Meta Groudon.

name: Shadows in the Desert
description: Explore Orre and uncover the origin of Shadow Pokémon.

quests.description: Travel to Orre and explore the Outskirt Stand.
Fight Willie
Fight Folly the Shady Guy in Phenac City
Check what is in the mysterious sack.
Defeat 10 trainers who are using Shadow Pokémon in Phenac City.
Talk to the Mayor of Phenac City about the criminals you have been fighting.
Meet up with Rui again in Phenac City.
Fight trainers in Pyrite Town to flush out the criminals.
Talk to the distraught bodybuilder Duking in Pyrite Town.
Fight trainers in Pyrite Colosseum to flush out the criminals.
No sign of Shadow Pokémon so far. Fight trainers at the Pyrite Building to flush out the criminals.
Interrogate Hunter Doken in the Pyrite Building to find out who has taken Plusle, and where to.
Find Miror B. and rescue Duking's Plusle in Pyrite Cave!

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: How, how, how dare you! Don't you dare think you'll get away with your latest outrage! One of these days, I will take great pleasure in kicking you about with my elegant dance steps! Oh, and I'm not giving up our Shadow Pokémon plan!

quests.description: Free Duking's Plusle.
Discuss your next move with Rui at Pyrite Colosseum.
Defeat the Team Cipher Peons looting Agate Village.
Rui is worried her grandpa is in trouble. Search for him by clearing Relic Cave.
Find out more about Relic Cave from Grandpa Eagun.
There's rumors of more Team Cipher activity at Mt. Battle. Go investigate!

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: This isn't over yet. Stronger Pokémon are being made even now. You'd better get serious about training your Pokémon for our next meeting. Daahahah!

quests.description: Discuss your next move with Rui at Mt. Battle.
Track down the TV broadcast coming from The Under in Pyrite Town. Clear The Under.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Aiyeeeeh! How dare you! How could I get bested by a mere child? Remember this! I'll get you back for this!

quests.description: Search Venus' Studio in the Under for clues.
Follow the secret tunnel to the Cipher Lab and clear out the enemies.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Humph! Your struggle to get here was all in vain! The Shadow Pokémon we produced have already been moved elsewhere. And that, of course, includes the ultimate Shadow Pokémon I created for the boss! Wahahahah!

quests.description: Team Cipher has taken over Realgam Tower! Fight to kick them out!
From the top of Realgam Tower, you see Mayor Es Cade. Go ask him for help.
Team Cipher's leaders have holed up in the Realgam Colosseum. Fight them to end this once and for all!
Just when you have him cornered, Evice calls in a helicopter. Watch him escape the Realgam Colosseum.

name: A New World
description: End Team Galactic's plan to destroy the world and create a new one in its place.

quests.description: Team Galactic is stealing energy. Clear Valley Windworks.
Team Galactic is kidnapping Pokémon now. Clear Team Galactic Eterna Building in Eterna City.
All is quiet. Team Galactic isn't doing anything. Maybe they learned their lesson. Just keep traveling, I guess. Clear the Pastoria City Gym.
The boss of Team Galactic has been spotted in Celestic Town!
Cyrus is gone. Nothing to do but proceed. Adventure awaits! Clear the Canalave City Gym.
A commotion was heard at Lake Valor. You must protect the lake's guardian! Clear Lake Valor.
Lake Valor's guardian was taken. Better try again at the next lake. Clear Lake Verity.
Lake Verity's guardian was also taken. Only one lake remains. Clear Lake Acuity.
You failed to protect any of the lake guardians. They have been taken to Veilstone City. So that's what that strange building was... Clear Team Galactic HQ in Veilstone City.
The lake guardians have been rescued, but Cyrus has used them to forge the Red Chain. He is taking it to the top of Mount Coronet. Follow him! Clear Spear Pillar.

Cyrus planned to use the Red Chain to enslave Dialga and Palkia, but he accidentally angered Giratina and has been taken to its realm. A portal has appeared on top of Mount Coronet. Use it to follow Cyrus and end his threat once and for all. Clear Distortion World.

name: Recover the Precious Egg!
description: A rare egg is at the Sandgem Lab! Surely it should be easy to hatch one little egg, right?

quests.description: Speak to Professor Hastings in Sandgem Town.
Search for clues in Eterna Forest.
Catch or hatch 50 Water-type Pokémon, and see if those boulders are really just boulders.
Time to give those mysterious boulders the soaking of their life! Return to the Eterna Forest, and prepare for a battle.
Speak to the Go-Rock Commander in the Eterna Forest.
Chase the fleeing Go-Rock Squad through the Eterna Forest!
Keep chasing the Go-Rock Squad through the Eterna Forest, but... didn't they already pass that tree?
The Go-Rock Squad are definitely going in circles, but they're too dumb to realise it. Interrogate one on their method of navigating the Eterna Forest!
They're using Parasect to navigate the Eterna Forest. Clear out a Parasect and they should get trapped!
Now you've muddied the path, continue the Eterna Forest chase!
You've cornered the Go-Rock Commander outside the Old Chateau! Time to finish this.
Return the egg to Professor Hastings in Sandgem Town.
Professor Hastings has headed off to Canalave to do more research on Manaphy. Check in on him when you can!
A little girl's Happiny stole the egg! Search for witnesses east of Canalave!
The Happiny headed north out of Jubilife! Ask for witnesses in the next town.
The Happiny went north, through the Eterna Forest. Ask if anyone's seen it in Eterna City.
Search for someone who's seen the Happiny Egg-napper! It was last seen heading east across Route 211.
Keep asking around and following the Happiny Egg-thief! It was heading south, towards Solaceon Town.
Hopefully you can finally catch up to this Happiny at Hearthome City. Ask around for any witnesses.
The Happiny went through Mt. Coronet again? This time it went west through the Southern path. Ask around for witnesses on the other side.
The Happiny fled from Oreburgh and headed west, through the Oreburgh Gate. Search for another witness on the far side.
Search for evidence of the Happiny's path after turning south from Jubilife City.
An ex-Go-Rock in Sandgem Town has turned to Pokémon Pinching, and wants to steal the egg first. But after all you've been through to get it, he's in for a rude awakening
After leaving Sandgem, the Happiny went south-east, across the water. There's only one place it could be now...
Oh no, you're not gonna let more boulders stop you now. Catch or hatch 50 Fighting-types and smash right through them.
Time to head back to Pal Park and teach this little pink snot not to steal important eggs!
The egg hatched after your battle with the egg-nappers! Bring Manaphy back to Hastings in Canalave City, and close off this mission for good.

name: Zero's Ambition
description: Help Zero find an entrance to the Distortion World.

quests.description: Talk to Zero in the Fight Area.
Read the recently discovered book in Canalave City.
Report to Zero what was in the book.
At Lake Verity, ask Mesprit about the Distortion World.
Obtain 10 Purple Shards.
At Lake Valor, ask Azelf about the Distortion World.
Obtain 10 Ochre Shards.
At Lake Acuity, ask Uxie about the Distortion World.
Obtain 10 Crimson Shards.
Clear Sendoff Spring to meet the Lake Trio.
Talk to the Lake Trio in Sendoff Spring.
Charge the key to the Distortion World.
Gain 1 Spooky Plate.
Talk to Zero in Sendoff Spring.
Defeat Zero to protect the key.
Catch the ruler of the Distortion World.
Talk to Zero in Sendoff Spring.

name: Hollow Truth and Ideals
description: Prevent Team Plasma from using these dangerous Splicers.

quests.description: A Team Plasma Grunt in Virbank City would like to steal your Pokémon. Defeat the grunt.
Some Team Plasma Grunts were seen entering the Castelia Sewers. Clear Castelia Sewers.
Investigate the Perfectly Ordinary Frigate.
Seems there's nothing suspicious going on in Castelia City. Time to continue your journey. Clear the Nimbasa Gym.
Hugh thinks some Team Plasma Grunts in Nimbasa City are stealing Pokémon. Defeat the grunts.
They are definitely stealing Pokémon. Investigate the Totally Unsuspicious Frigate.
Defeat the Team Plasma Grunts on the Totally Unsuspicious Frigate.
Talk to Zinzolin.
The Frigate is gone. Nothing to do but move forward. Clear route 13.
You have stumbled upon Zinzolin and a Team Plasma Grunt in Lacunosa Town. Defeat the grunt.
Defeat Zinzolin.
Defeat the Opelucid City gym leader to obtain the DNA Splicers before Team Plasma does!
Team Plasma has stolen the DNA Splicers and is assaulting the city with an army of grunts and shadows! Defend against the Team Plasma Assault!
Defeat Zinzolin.
Defeat the Plasma Shadow.
Team Plasma has fled the scene with the stolen DNA Splicers. Find and clear out the Plasma Frigate.
Team Plasma's leader Ghetsis plans on using the DNA Splicers on Kyurem in Giant Chasm. Clear the dungeon to end his evil plans.
Talk to Colress on the Plasma Frigate.
Defeat Colress.
Defeat the Plasma Shadows.
Talk to the Shadow Triad.
Ghetsis has done something to the legendary Dragon-type Pokémon inside Giant Chasm!
Defeat Ghetsis one final time!

name: Destiny Deoxys
description: Discover the mystery of the crashed meteor.

quests.description: There seems to be a big fuss about a new discovery in the Giant Chasm. Try finding it.
You found a pulsating Green Gemstone. Take a closer look.
Rayquaza and Deoxys are rampaging in the area. Try to calm them down.
Now that the situation has calmed down talk to the local scientists about the Green Gemstone.
Check out the Battle Frontier while the scientist analyzes the gemstone.
While you were in the Battle Frontier an army of Deoxys attacked. Fight your way out!
The scientist you met at Giant Chasm is looking for you at the Battle Frontier.
The generator isn't working. Look around for scraps to repair it.
Rayquaza attacks again. Calm it down for the last time.
Rayquaza realized that the Deoxys are no threat. Reunite the Purple and Green Gemmed Deoxys.

name: Swords of Justice
description: The Swords of Justice sense something bad is about to happen, will you be able to help them out?

quests.description: Talk to the Old Man in Mistralton Cave for clues on where the Swords of Justice are.
Search around Mistralton Cave to see if you can find Cobalion, as the Old Man said.
It looks like you've found Cobalion! Talk to them.
Start reuniting the Swords of Justice once again. You should probably start looking for Terrakion around Unova's Victory Road.
You've found Terrakion! Talk to them about the reunion.
Defeat Terrakion to prove you're worthy of their trust.
Talk to Cobalion at the Moor of Icirrus to learn where to find Virizion.
Now that you know where to find Virizion, search for them in Pinwheel Forest.
Now that you've found Virizion, tell them to meet the others at the Moor of Icirrus.
Virizion is asking you to gather 5,000 Grass Gems to prove you're a trustworthy ally. Collect the gems and return to Pinwheel Forest to prove your worth.
Now that you've gathered all of the Grass Gems, talk to Virizion in Pinwheel Forest once again.
Meet up with the Swords of Justice at Moor of Icirrus and talk to Cobalion.
They need you to prove you're strong enough to deal with the possible dangers. Defeat the Swords of Justice!
Now that you've proven you're strong enough to help, take Cobalion's advice and search for Kyurem in the Giant Chasm.
Report your findings to Cobalion at the Moor of Icirrus.
Looks like Cobalion has seen Kyurem near Lacunosa Town. Go there and defeat Kyurem before it hurts any citizens.
Seems like Kyurem has fled the town. You should talk to Cobalion while you're there.
Kyurem is probably hiding in the Giant Chasm. Find its lair.
You've finally found Kyurem! Defeat it with the help of the Swords of Justice.
Kyurem has injured the Swords of Justice, go check on Cobalion.
Defeat Kyurem and stop it from causing any more harm!
You've finally defeated Kyurem, sealing it within the Giant Chasm forever. Talk to the Swords of Justice in the Giant Chasm.
Talk to Cobalion.
Talk to Terrakion.
Talk to Virizion.
The Swords of Justice all depart for their homes to wait for your arrival. Go catch your new friends and add them to your team!
Capture the Leader of the Swords of Justice, Cobalion, in Mistralton Cave.
Capture the Toughest of the Swords of Justice, Terrakion, in Victory Road.
Capture the Cleverest of the Swords of Justice, Virizion, in Pinwheel Forest.

name: The Legend Awakened
description: Learn about the powerful Pokémon discovered under the P2 Laboratory.

quests.description: Investigate the basement of the P2 Laboratory.
Fight the mysterious Pokémon in the Castelia Sewers.
Search the Castelia Sewers for clues about the Red Genesect.
Talk to the Ancient Bug Hunter in the Castelia Sewers.
Defeat the four Genesect surrounding Castelia City.
The Red Genesect is trying to escape the Castelia Sewers, stop it!
Witness the battle between the Red Genesect and another powerful Pokémon in Castelia City.
The Red Genesect has crashed into the P2 Lab and escaped underground. Start digging to learn more.
Catch Genesect in P2 Lab.

name: Gale of Darkness
description: Team Cipher has returned to Orre. Stop their new evil plan!

quests.description: Ask around Gateon Port for clues about new Team Cipher activity.
Fight the Cipher Peons attacking the Pokémon HQ Lab.
Clear Gateon Port to search for the Cipher Peons who kidnapped Professor Krane.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Cipher? Nah, I don't play with those punks. I'm my own man, flying solo. No, I won't say where I got this Zangoose.

quests.description: Talk to Chobin at Kaminko's Manor, if he's willing to talk.
Talk to Chobin at Kaminko's Manor.
Talk to Grandpa Eagun at the Relic Stone.
Clear Mount Battle and see if anyone there has a lead on the source of Shadow Pokémon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Wow, you've got some strong Pokémon! You might be able to beat Team Cipher! I heard they re-activated their operations at the Cipher Lab.

quests.description: Track down the new boss of the Cipher Lab.
Talk to Cipher Admin Lovrina at the Cipher Lab.
Pyrite Town is in chaos! Battle your way through to get some answers.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: This is Marcia live on the scene! Chaos in Pyrite Town as Team Cipher has returned! Rumors are swirling about an infamous dance machine making a scene!

quests.description: Find and defeat Miror B. near a cool cave.
Track down the new boss of the Pyrite Building.
Talk to Cipher Commander Exol at the Pyrite Building.
Battle through the new Cipher Peons in Phenac City.
Track down the new boss of the Phenac Stadium.
Talk to Cipher Admin Snattle at the Phenac Stadium.
Talk to Mayor Trest at the Phenac City.
Talk to the wealthy Mr. Verich at Gateon Port to learn more about the S. S. Libra.
Talk to Chobin at Kaminko's Manor, if he's willing to talk.
Talk to Chobin at Kaminko's Manor.
Fight the Cipher Peon at the wreck of the S. S. Libra.
Search the S. S. Libra for clues.
Fight Zook outside of the Cipher Key Lair.
Miror B. has surfaced again! Fight him at the Outskirt Stand.
Battle through the Snagem Hideout and look for clues.
You found a key to the Cipher Key Lair. Find out what's inside!

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Bah! No fair! Fine, you can take your precious Professor Krane. Get out of here!

quests.description: Talk to Professor Krane at the Pokémon HQ Lab.
Battle through Team Cipher on Citadark Isle
Defeat Grand Master Greevil and XD001 in the Citadark Isle Dome.

name: A Beautiful World
description: End Team Flare's plan to destroy the world and create a new one in its place.

quests.description: Talk to Lysandre inside Professor Sycamore's lab in Lumiose City.
Well, that was definitely a weird guy... Seems like Calem wants to meet you somewhere in Lumiose City, go talk with him.
Meet Calem in Ambrette Town.
Clear Glittering Cave and find the scientist.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: What's this? Well, well. What do we have here? A nosy little trainer has come poking around. Listen up! We're the fashionable team whose very name makes people tremble in fear: Team Flare! Team Flare's goal is to make it so we're the only ones who are happy! We don't care one bit about what happens to other trainers or Pokémon. Get out of here, kid. Don't you know not to play with fire? We'll obliterate you!

quests.description: It seems that Team Flare Grunt is holding the scientist captive, free him!
From what you gathered, Team Flare wanted to sell fossils for money. Talk with the fossil scientist you just rescued in Glittering Cave.
With interesting thoughts about Team Flare in your head, you decide to challenge the Cyllage City Gym to become stronger.
You can see in Geosenge Town the Team Flare Grunt you battled earlier. Approach him once more.
Beat the Team Flare Grunt once more!
You heard rumors of Diantha being in Coumarine City. Go there to check if you can see her.
Lysandre is calling you while you are standing in Coumarine City, pick up the phone.
Well, that was extremely awkward... But ignoring that, Lumiose City still hasn't fixed the power outage, go clear the Kalos Power Plant.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: You're quite strong. Oh yes... very strong, indeed. I certainly didn't expect you to be so interesting. But it matters not, we already have enough energy to power the device. I do hope we can meet again!

quests.description: You've helped with the power outage problem, now the gym in Lumiose City is back up and you can challenge it!
Professor Sycamore wants to meet you in Lumiose City. He's with Lysandre, go say hi.
For someone so obsessed with beauty he seems to really care about filth... Anyway, the Poké Ball Factory sounds like a fun place, let's go check it out.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: No way you beat us! Wow, we are lame. Probability is just probability after all... Absolutes do not exist. But enough already! We've already stolen the Poké Balls, Great Balls, and Ultra Balls. Let's call it good and leave.

quests.description: Now that Team Flare is not in the Poké Ball Factory anymore, talk with the Director that you just saved.
Professor Sycamore is waiting for you in Dendemille Town. He has some important things to say about the legendary Pokémon of Kalos.
You were going to Frost Cavern for Pokémon, but what you found there is Team Flare instead! Clear it!

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Not just strong... TOO strong! Not ordinary, indeed. Whatever, it doesn't matter, we already tested what we wanted to know. The Abomasnow from this cavern is a fine specimen. The more we agitate it, the stronger its Snow Warning ability becomes, making the snow fall even more furiously. Whoever has the most energy will come out on top! And it's Team Flare, and only Team Flare who will survive!

quests.description: So everything is over now, right? Right? Go beat Anistar City Gym!
Lysandre is giving an important speech through the TV News. Watch it in Anistar City.
Wow! Absolutely no one could have seen this coming! You think you might find Lysandre in Lumiose City where you first met him. Look for him!
Show Team Flare Lysandre the strength of your convictions in Lumiose City!
You run after Lysandre and while going through the Labs you find a jailed mysterious man in Lumiose City. It seems like he has a story to tell...
Now that you learnt what the ultimate weapon is able to do, you need to stop it. Team Flare Xerosic is in the way in Lumiose City, defeat him!
Xerosic offers you the possibility to stop the ultimate weapon in Lumiose City. Blue or Red Button, press one!
Press the blue button!
Press the red button!
The ultimate weapon was activated in Geosenge Town! Go to the Team Flare Secret HQ to put a stop to it! First step: Beating Team Flare Aliana.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: I had fun at the Kalos Power Plant. Of course, we could have generated electricity with Team Flare's technology, too, you know. We just didn't think it justified the cost. To create a world for us and us alone, we have to play it smart, you see.

quests.description: Continue traversing through the Team Flare Secret HQ! Second step: Beating Team Flare Celosia.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: In reality, those stones that line Route 10 are the graves of Pokémon. When the ultimate weapon was used to end that horrible war over 3,000 years ago, it stole the lives of all those Pokémon. Their lives were the price of peace then. And if we want to make our own wishes come true today, we in Team Flare also have to sacrifice something precious.

quests.description: You should be halfway through. Go further in the Team Flare Secret HQ! Third step: Beating Team Flare Bryony.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: We've been using the electricity we stole from the Power Plant to get everything prepared for activating the ultimate weapon. But it's not like that's all we'll need to use it. Are you following me? We'll need energy absorbed from Pokémon to power the device! Yes! It's the stones on Route 10 that will steal that energy for us and power the ultimate weapon.

quests.description: You are getting close. Resume delving into the Team Flare Secret HQ! Fourth step: Beating Team Flare Mable.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: The power of the Legendary Pokémon... The power to grant life to all around it... The power to steal life from all around it... It's a mysterious ability that even scientists like us haven't been able to really decode. What d'you think will happen to the world if we fuel the ultimate weapon with something like that?

quests.description: You are almost there! One more time traversing through the Team Flare Secret HQ and you'll get to the end! Fifth step: Beating Team Flare Lysandre.
This is it, you've beaten Lysandre at the top of his game in Team Flare Secret HQ, right? He might have something else to say...
You go to the lowest level of the Team Flare Secret HQ as Lysandre told you to. There you find Xerneas and Yveltal fighting each other! Fight them yourself and calm them down!
Calm Xerneas down!
Calm Yveltal down!
Lysandre appears menacingly in front of you in Team Flare Secret HQ. He doesn't seem fazed about you subsiding both legendary Pokémon.
Stop Team Flare Boss Lysandre in Team Flare Secret HQ once and for all!!
You did it! You saved Kalos! There is nothing else to do except to continue your journey to beat the Kalos Pokémon League!
What an amazing trainer! You became Kalos Champion! There is a parade in your honor in Lumiose City. But wait, AZ is there asking you for a battle. Show him what being a Pokémon Trainer is like!

name: The Delta Episode
description: A catastrophe is on the horizon! Work with the people of Hoenn to stop it.

quests.description: Talk to Dr. Cozmo in Fallarbor Town.
Talk to the mysterious figure at the Sky Pillar.
Travel with Zinnia to Littleroot Town and talk to May.
Discuss the news with Professor Birch in Littleroot Town.
quests.npcName: Discuss the news with Professor Birch

quests.description: Find out why May is so mad in Littleroot Town.
Follow Zinnia to Petalburg City.
Defeat Courtney
Defeat Matt
Talk to Wally and answer your ringing Holo Caster in Petalburg City.
Answer your ringing Holo Caster.
Talk to Wally.
Search Granite Cave and look for Star Pieces.
Clear Granite Cave 10 times.
Find a Star Piece.
Talk to Zinnia in Granite Cave.
Defeat Zinnia in Granite Cave
Talk to Zinnia in Granite Cave.
Talk to Dr. Cozmo at the Mossdeep Space Center.
Talk to Zinnia at the Mossdeep Space Center.
Talk to Dr. Cozmo at the Mossdeep Space Center.
Clear Meteor Falls 10 times to search for the Meteor Shard.
Talk to the Draconid Elder in Meteor Falls.
Defeat the Draconid Elder in Meteor Falls.
Talk to the Draconid Elder in Meteor Falls.
Defeat the Team Aqua and Magma Grunts attacking the Mossdeep Space Center.
Defeat the Aqua Grunt.
Defeat the Magma Grunt.
Defeat the admins trying to take over the Mossdeep Space Center.
Defeat Courtney
Defeat Matt
Talk to Zinnia at the Mossdeep Space Center.
Follow Zinnia to the Aqua hideout and search for her.
Talk to Archie in the Team Aqua Hideout.
Follow Zinnia to the Magma Hideout and search for her.
Talk to Maxie in the Team Magma Hideout.
Talk to Wallace in Sootopolis City.
Defeat Wallace in Sootopolis City.
Defeat Zinnia at the Sky Pillar.
Talk to Zinnia at the Sky Pillar.
Mega Evolve Rayquaza.
Talk to Zinnia at the Sky Pillar.
Fly Mega Rayquaza into space to destroy the Meteor.
Talk to Dr. Cozmo at the Mossdeep Space Center.

name: Primal Reversion
description: Teams Aqua and Magma have been trying to unlock the Primal power of Groudon and Kyogre.

quests.description: Talk to Mr. Stone in Slateport City.
Clear Granite Cave 10 times to search for the Primal Reversion Mural.
Examine the Primal Murals.
Examine the first Primal Mural in Granite Cave.
Examine the second Primal Mural in Granite Cave.
Talk to Steven in the Granite Cave to learn more about the Primal Murals.
Find Captain Stern at Sea Mauville during Thunderstorm Weather.
Fight Captain Stern at Sea Mauville.
Talk to Captain Stern at Sea Mauville about the mysteries of the sea.
Obtain the items Captain Stern needs to upgrade the Submarine.
Find 10 Metal Coats.
Find one Mystic Water.
Find 3 Heat Rocks.
Talk to Captain Stern at Sea Mauville and upgrade the submarine.
Clear the Seafloor Cavern 10 times to learn more about the mysterious occurrences.
Defeat the Team Aqua and Team Magma leaders in the Seafloor Cavern.
Defeat Archie
Defeat Maxie
Clear the Weather Institute 10 times to search for clues about Archie and Maxie's plans.
Scan the area for unusual weather at the Weather Institute.
Investigate Mt. Pyre for the source of the disturbances.
Find out what the Team Leaders are up to at Mt. Pyre.
Talk to Archie.
Talk to Maxie.
Defeat the Primal Reversions. Predict their rampage by monitoring the weather at the Weather Institute.
Defeat Primal Groudon in Harsh Sunlight Weather.
Defeat Primal Kyogre in Raining Weather.
Talk to Mr. Stone in Slateport City.

name: Detective Pikachu
description: Detective Pikachu's partner has gone missing, and he needs your help!

quests.description: Search Goldenrod City for clues.
Defeat the Aipoms
The Aipoms dropped some sort of vial while they were running away. It looks like they were headed towards the Radio Tower. Find it!
Detective Pikachu has an informant who knows more about the mysterious vial. Meet with him in Saffron City.
The informant is proving hard to convince. Time to get physical!
The informant is finally willing to "talk", find out what he has to say.
Infiltrate the underground fighting ring.
Go to Clifford Industries in Goldenrod City to demand some answers.
Meet up with investigative journalist Lucy Stevens in Hearthome City
Search the research laboratory for clues.
It was an ambush! You have been followed to Nuvema Town, defeat the mysterious attackers and escape!
Detective Pikachu is injured. He asks you to get help from his friend near Cerulean Cave
Confront Howard Clifford in Goldenrod City about his involvement with the R vials.
Defeat Howard's bodyguard and escape.
Give Howard Clifford one last chance to surrender!
Defeat Mewtwo to free it from Howard's control!
Talk to Mewtwo near Cerulean Cave about Detective Pikachu's partner.
Talk to Detective Raichu

name: The Great Vivillon Hunt!
description: Discover the beauty of Vivillon.

quests.description: Capture or hatch 100 string-type Pokémon.

Find and capture the rare Vivillon!
Hint: It has been spotted at some Lakes.
Capture or hatch 100 string-type Pokémon.

Find and capture the rare Vivillon!
Hint: It's surrounded by strong Pokémon.
Capture or hatch 100 string-type Pokémon.

Find and capture the rare Vivillon!
Hint: It has been spotted in a swamp.

Hint: It has been spotted dancing in the moonlight.

Find and capture the rare Vivillon!
Hint: It's surrounded by dragons.
Capture or hatch 100 string-type Pokémon.

Find and capture the rare Vivillon!
Hint: It can be found at a very cold place.
Capture or hatch 200 Normal-type Pokémon.

Find and capture the rare Vivillon!
Hint: Only the strongest Challengers can reach it.

name: Princess Diancie
description: Princess Diancie has been spotted in Kalos! She's searching for something.

quests.description: Capture or hatch 100 Fairy-type Pokémon to follow Diancie's Fairy Aura.
Defend Diancie from the attacking ninja in Shalour City.
Diancie has escaped to the shopping mall in Lumiose City, but is under attack again!
Diancie has fled to the Diamond Domain. Dig in the Underground to find it.
Millis and Argus Steel let you do the hard work while they set up an ambush in Shalour City.
Millis and Argus Steel fled but their Aegislash stayed behind. Look for it in Shalour City and find out what it wants!
Diancie needs help building a Heart Diamond to stabilize the Diamond Domain. Gather some Fairy Gems for her.
Talk to Princess Diancie in Shalour City.
Capture Diancie in Reflection Cave.
A rampaging Yveltal is threatening the Diamond Domain! Help Diancie defeat it!

name: Clash of Ages
description: Hoopa is up to something mischievous...

quests.description: Catch Hoopa to learn more.
Talk to Baraz in Kiloude City.
Defeat 100 Psychic-type Pokémon.
That didn't work. Talk to Baraz in Kiloude City.
That didn't work either. Talk to Baraz in Kiloude City.
Catch 100 Hoopa.
This is ridiculous. Talk to Baraz in Kiloude City.
Defeat the Unbound Hoopa and its summoned defenders near Kiloude City.
Defeat the Unbound Hoopa and its summoned defenders near Shalour City.
Defeat the Unbound Hoopa and its summoned defenders near Lumiose City.
Defeat the Unbound Hoopa and its summoned defenders near Anistar City.
Defeat the Unbound Hoopa and its summoned defenders near Laverre City.
Defeat the Unbound Hoopa near Kiloude City, this time for real.

name: An Unrivaled Power
description: It has been said that Mewtwo can Mega Evolve. Search for clues on how to find its Mega Stones, so you can control this unrivaled power.

quests.description: Red might know something. Fight him at Indigo Plateau Kanto then ask him what he knows.
.....right. Of course..... Well, you have no leads for now, so may as well defeat and catch some Psychic and Fighting-type Pokémon.
Defeat 1500 Psychic-type Pokémon.
Defeat 750 Fighting-type Pokémon.
Blue has contacted you, saying he knows something but wants a fight first. He is at Viridian City.
Talk to Blue in Viridian City.
Look for Blue's old rival in Cerulean Cave
You eventually found a trainer standing where Mewtwo once did in Cerulean Cave. Talk to Green.
It seems Green is irritated that you caught Mewtwo before she could. Defeat her in Cerulean Cave.
Talk to Green in Cerulean Cave.
Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Cerulean Cave.
Mewtwo wishes to find a place it can live undisturbed. You know of such a place, but it seems unwilling to listen. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo near Cerulean Cave so you may attempt to talk to it.
It escaped to the west. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo again.
It changed form and flew off in the direction of the sea. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo yet again.
It flew off to the peak of a great mountain. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo yet again.
It flew off to a faraway region to hide in a large city. Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo yet again.
Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.
Gather the Great Twisted Spoon, Psychic Gems, and Fighting Gems for Mewtwo.
Find the Great Twisted Spoon in P2 Lab.
Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.
Defeat Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.
Talk to Anomaly Mewtwo in Pokémon Village.

name: Welcome to Paradise, Cousin!
description: Time to kick off your Alolan vacation! See the sights around Melemele Island.

quests.description: Protect the mysterious girl's Pokémon! Battle the Spearow near the Ruins of Conflict.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: The bridge collapses and you and the floating Pokémon start falling to your doom... But you are saved by a mysterious Pokémon!

quests.description: Ask the mysterious girl if she's okay.
Follow Lillie to the Trainers' School dungeon and clear it.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: You seemed to be in perfect sync with your Pokémon—weren't you? Um... Since we've come this far together, why don't I show you some more of the city?

quests.description: Beat up the Team Skull grunts loitering on Hau'oli City's Dock.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: My thanks to you and your Pokémon. These grunts are always bothering me and my trial site. You... you're the trainer who cleared the Trainers' School so effortlessly! Allow me to see if you're ready for my trial!

quests.description: Battle Ilima in Hau'oli City.
Clear Ilima's Trial at Verdant Cavern.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: What an incredible Trainer you are! The Z-Crystal from the pedestal is yours now! It is known as Normalium Z!

quests.description: Lillie needs your help. Continue past Route 3 and clear Melemele Meadow.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage:
Pew!

Nebby flees.

quests.description: Nebby escaped into a hole! Clear the Seaward Cave dungeon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage:
Pew~

Nebby stays. It seems like it's following you now!

quests.description: The Ultra Recon Squad is awaiting a battle in Seaward Cave. Show them the thrill of the fight!

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: That one you have come to collect... You must know that it is able to warp away when threatened, but the holes that are created when it does so leave a path open to dangerous beings. Be careful of who you trust it to.

quests.description: Return Nebby to Lillie in Melemele Meadow.
Lillie still has something on her mind. Talk to her in Iki Town.
Defeat Hala in Iki Town to complete Melemele's Grand Trial!
There is one more Z Crystal on Ten Carat Hill. Find the Trial Site and claim it!
quests.boss: Trial Site of Ten Carat Hill

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Hello there. There's a wonderful breeze blowing out here today. The glistening Flyinium Z... It's yours now. Use it well.

name: Symbiotic Relations
description: Help Lillie and Nebby on Akala Island and meet some friendly faces.

quests.description: Plan out your course of action with Lillie in Heahea City.
Clear Lana's Trial at Brooklet Hill.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Very well done! You do know what this is, don't you? Please take this Waterium Z.

quests.description: The Ultra Recon Squad is investigating an oddly familiar tree. Go check it out on Route 5.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: That must have been the Pokémon known as Sudowoodo. Our research is insufficient to define what it means to be a Pokémon Trainer... We'll never be able to stop the Blinding One like this...

quests.description: Team Skull is causing trouble on Route 6! Looks like they haven't learned their lesson.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Give me your name, Trainer. $playername$, eh? That's a fine name. I like the way you handled yourself in battle. Perhaps we'll meet again someday.

quests.description: Clear Kiawe's Trial at Wela Volcano Park.
quests.boss: Trial Site of Wela Volcano Park

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Whoa! S-spectacular! That Pokémon was protecting this Firium Z. Now it is yours.

quests.description: Clear Mallow's Trial at Lush Jungle.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Wow, you're even stronger than I thought! Looks like you've cleared all three of Akala's trials! Here! A gift for such an inspiring young Trainer!

quests.description: Talk to Professor Burnet in Heahea City after you've finished exploring Lush Jungle.
You hear the echoes of bad rap and low self-esteem in the distance. Clear Diglett's Tunnel.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Just when things were startin' to heat up, yo, I got surrounded by Diglett and beat up, yo!

quests.description: Reach Kahuna Olivia and Lillie at the Ruins of Life and complete Akala's Grand Trial!
A strange creature has appeared in Aether Paradise. Make it go away. Clear the Ultra Wormhole.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Why so shocked? Was it your first time seeing an Ultra Beast? Those mysterious creatures that live beyond the Ultra Wormholes, the holes that suddenly open in the sky and lead to Ultra Space... It would serve you well to remember this.

name: Child of the Stars
description: Learn more about Nebby's origins with Lillie on Ula'Ula Island.

quests.description: Read about the legends of Alola with Lillie in Malie City.
Team Skull are trying to steal a bus stop sign on Route 10! This misdeed won't go unpunished!
Clear Sophocles's Trial at Hokulani Observatory.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: That Pokémon was really something else! Here, I'll give you this Electrium Z to reward you for beating it.

quests.description: Team Skull are being annoying. Get rid of them. Beat their boss Guzma in the Malie Garden dungeon.
Lillie has run into a Team Skull grunt at Aether House. Politely beat up his Pokémon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: I just wanted to go for a stroll on my own, to see what it must feel like to be a Trainer... So Hapu and I went our separate ways... but then Nebby tried to get out of my bag...

quests.description: Clear Acerola's Trial at Thrifty Megamart.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Welcome back! Now let's see how you did... Yup! You passed my trial! Here you go!

quests.description: Team Skull have stolen the Yungoos from Aether House. Raid their base. Clear the Po Town dungeon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: There is a chest full of Bug-type Z-Crystals next to Guzma. You obtained a Buginium Z!

quests.description: Team Skull have stolen Nebby! Battle Gladion at Aether House.
Kahuna Nanu is challenging you to a Grand Trial in Malie City! Test your strength before you go to Aether by defeating him.
Aether president Lusamine has recruited Team Skull and is using Nebby to open an Ultra Wormhole. Stop her. Clear the Aether Foundation dungeon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: That Lusamine! We will need you to leave us in peace so that we may do our job. Please don't get in our way. Leave Cosmog to us.

quests.description: Aether Branch Faba's ego is blocking your way. Defeat him in the Aether Foundation dungeon to get closer to Lusamine.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: H-h-how can this be?! How could this child... If you're looking for Cosmog, I suppose it might be downstairs.

quests.description: Ya boy Guzma is here. Defeat him in the Aether Foundation dungeon. Lusamine is next.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: The daughter who stole my Cosmog from me and the son who took my Type: Null! All I ever did was give you two all the love I had, and all you did was betray me! You have no right to ask for my attention now!</br>But it doesn't matter now. None of that matters now! Watch... I will open the Ultra Wormhole for you... Come to me, my sweet beast!

quests.description: Lusamine is using Nebby to open an Ultra Wormhole! Defeat her in the Aether Foundation dungeon to put a stop to this.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage:
All that I want is my precious beast! I don't care about any of the rest of you! I don't care if you are my child or not! If you're not beautiful enough to be worthy of my love, then I don't NEED you!

Lusamine left into the Ultra Wormhole.

quests.description: Talk to Lillie and Gladion at Aether Paradise when you're ready to go to the next island.
Talk to Lillie.
Talk to Gladion.
There are more Z Crystals on Ula'ula. Find the Trial Site hidden in Haina Desert after clearing the Route.
Get the Steelium Z. Defeat Molayne in Hokulani Observatory.

name: Emissary of Light
description: Seek out the Pokémon of Alola's legends on Poni Island.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Oh! Been a while, friends. The kahuna? Hrmm. Well, I suppose the time might be right now... All right. Let us all proceed to the ruins. You stick with me, you two.

quests.description: Talk to Hapu at the Ruins of Hope.
Hapu has permitted you to visit sacred ground. Find the other flute by clearing Exeggutor Island Hill.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Now we have both the Sun Flute and the Moon Flute!

quests.description: Team Skull are being annoying again. Settle the score with them near Vast Poni Canyon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage:
That's enough, grunts. No one wants to see a sore loser.

You. To be honest, I've treated you really badly. Even if I apologize, I know it's probably too late for you to forgive me. This is my way of saying sorry, OK? Take it. It's Poisonium Z.

quests.description: Proceed to Vast Poni Canyon and prove your skills in a Grand Trial against Poni's new kahuna, Hapu!
Clear the ancient Trial Site of Vast Poni Canyon.
quests.boss: Trial Site of Vast Poni Canyon

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: You obtained a Dragon-Type Z-Crystal. The Dragonium Z is yours!

quests.description: Choose a time of day to play a flute with Lillie at the Altar.
Play the Sun Flute during Day or Dusk.
Play the Moon Flute during Night or Dawn.
Help Lillie get through to her mother! Defeat Lusamine at the Altar of the Sunne and Moone.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Lillie...</br>...</br>Heh...</br>When did you... start becoming so beautiful?

quests.description: Everyone is finally safe. Talk to Lillie.

name: Eater of Light
description: A dangerous Pokémon from another world threatens the Alola region.

quests.description: Stop the Eater of Light from absorbing all light in Alola. Defeat Ultra Necrozma at the Altar of the Sunne and Moone.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Necrozma shone with such blinding light, as it used to, only to lose that light all over again... It seems to have fled somewhere now. We are grateful to you, human of Alola. May we all eventually be awash in light again.

quests.description: Everyone is finally safe again. Talk to Lillie.
You are challenged by Pokémon Trainer Lillie! Welcome her to the world of trainers by battling her at the Altar of the Sunne and Moone.
Clear Mina's Trial at Mina's Houseboat.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: That's a pretty great picture. You and your Pokémon! You're a great Pokémon Trainer! So here you go! A piece of Fairium Z for you!

quests.description: Battle Gladion on Ula'ula one last time before ascending to the Pokémon League.
One step closer to victory: Clear Mount Lanakila!

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: You see Necrozma unconscious in a crater, drained of light and in a dormant state. Best to let it rest for a while.

quests.description: You were so distracted by Necrozma you forgot about the Z Crystal! Find the Trial Site in the Mount Lanakila dungeon.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Congratulations! You've claimed the Icium Z! Onwards to the Pokémon League now!

name: Island Challenge
description: Embark on the Island Challenge and be graced by the Tapus' presence!

quests.description: Start your Island Challenge at Professor Kukui's Lab.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Woah there, tester! This quest is still under development! You should go out there and test the story in the meantime, yeah!

name: Typing some Memories
description: Help Gladion restore his Silvally's memories.

quests.description: Talk to Gladion in the Aether Foundation.
Get some training before looking for Silvally's memories. Catch or hatch 100 Fighting, Rock, Dark and Fairy Types
Start your search for Silvally's memories by asking important people around Alola.
Talk to important people around Melemele Island.
Talk to important people around Akala Island.
Talk to important people around Ula'ula Island.
Talk to important people around Poni Island.
Talk to Gladion in the Aether Foundation and tell him what you found out about Silvally's memories.
You probably need to train a little before going looking for more of Silvally memories. Catch or hatch 100 Water, Grass, Fire, Electric, Ground and Ice types.
Search for Silvally's Memory near pools of freshwater. Ask Gladion at Aether Foundation if you're lost.
Buy the Water Memory from Captain Lana with Dungeon Tokens.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Thank you so much $playername$! Now I can finally buy that rod I've always wanted!

quests.description: Search for Silvally's Memory in overgrown forests. Ask Gladion at Aether Foundation if you're lost.
Buy the Grass Memory from Captain Mallow with Quest Points.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Thank you, $playername$. I'll go to the market and buy the new ingredients right now!

quests.description: Search for Silvally's Memory near fiery hotspots. Ask Gladion at Aether Foundation if you're lost.
Buy the Fire Memory from Captain Kiawe with Battle Points.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Thanks, $playername$. I'll be going to the market to buy the project supplies this instant.

quests.description: Search for Silvally's Memory in electrical institutions. Ask Gladion at Aether Foundation if you're lost.
Buy the Electric Memory from Captain Sophocles with Pokédollars.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Thank you, $playername$! Now I'll go buy some new equipment for my laboratory.

quests.description: Search for Silvally's Memory near snow-covered peaks. Ask Gladion at Aether Foundation if you're lost.
Buy the Ice Memory from Veteran Aristo with Diamonds.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: You're the best, kiddo! I'm sure she'll love the ring I'll buy her with these diamonds!

quests.description: Search for Silvally's Memory in isolated ground. Ask Gladion at Aether Foundation if you're lost.
Buy the Ground Memory from Kahuna Hapu with Farm Points.

optionalArgs.clearedMessage: Wow you're pretty good at the farm, $playername$! I'll go buy the palm tree seeds right this instant!
